data.text: @thinktankSK I wondered about that. Thanks for clarifying about MB and QC

@thinktankSK @DaleBurnay I wish you would write an article about how our provincial health care system is not “free”. The cost of a doctor’s visit, going to the ER, a hospital bed, an ICU bed, a surgical bed - we take for granted our health care system.

@thinktankSK Big deal, time to start living with the new flu.
Geez I've known more than a dozen ppl that have had it the last month... non we very sick at all.. includes my 92 y/o neighbor.
